Room.Name: Bendine Way/Darmanian Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Darmanian Way and Bendine Way.
Room.LongDescription: Darmanian Way runs east and west out of the intersection while Bendine Way runs north and south. On the southeastern corner of the intersection is the Blue Rose Meditation Chamber. On the southwestern corner is the Cathedral of Worldly Bliss, and on the northwestern corner is the Oceancrest Municiple Library.
